extToolTipPlaying.description: Extenstion icon tooltip when playing a song [title, artist]

playInPlayer.description: Tooltip for Play button on Last.fm pages

playbackStopped.description: Text to display in Player when playback is stopped

nothingToPlay.description: Error message when there are no more tracks in playlist

trackNotInPlaylist.description: Error message when requested track is not in the playlist [trackId]

noMp3sForTrack.message: No mp3s found in the music database
noMp3sForTrack.description: Error message when no mp3 files have been found for track [title, artist]

playCurrentTrack.description: Tooltip for the player's Play button

playNextTrack.description: Tooltip for the player's Next button

pauseCurrentTrack.description: Tooltip for the player's Pause button

revealCurrentTrackInPlayList.description: Tooltip for the status bar's 'current track number (1/500)' label

scrobblingStatusOn.description: Text to display on the status bar's 'scrobbling status' label when scrobbling is on

scrobblingStatusOff.description: Text to display on the status bar's 'scrobbling status' label when scrobbling is off

toggleScrobbling.description: Tooltip for the status bar's 'toggle scrobbling' label
